description: This is a deliciously fruity and creamy dessert that has a marriage of sweetness and tartness.
name: Strawberry & Rhubarb Fool Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 200g rhubarb, washed, chopped and leaves removed

recipeInstructions.text: In a pot on a medium heat, cook the rhubarb and strawberries with the sugar and water for 10 minutes while mixing and then allow to cool.
Combine the cream, vanilla and caster sugar in a bowl and whip until it form peaks. Set to one side.
In your serving bowls, layer the cream mixture with the fruit mixture before serving.
